alert.note: Alert for Marion; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:27AM CDT until June 14 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MARION AND WESTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 1026 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Haleyville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Haleyville, Lynn, Double Springs, Needmore, Winston Free State Barn, Ashridge, Bear Creek, Natural Bridge, Weiss, Posey Field Airport, Tessner, Pebble, Upper Bear Creek Reservoir, Delmar, Sipsey River Rec Area and Grayson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
